summary: The sprint planning discussion confirmed Mike's agreement to Sprint SP-001, estimating it covers 20-25% of the MVP with foundational elements like styling, authentication, and Supabase integration. The plan was finalized, saved, and prepared for execution by the team.

decisions.title: Finalize Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Agreed to lock in the sprint focusing on STYLE-001, US-006, and US-008 for core architecture and enabling features.

sign_offs.what: Approved and agreed to proceed with Sprint SP-001

actions.task: Kick off execution of SP-001 by generating code, tests, and pushing to sandbox

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint plan updated with discussed details
